feed.title: Issueist Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Issueist news and events.

entry.title: Introducing Issuest
entry.summary: Improving your productivity is a lifelong journey. I find myself in a constant cycle of buy-and-try with different methods in the hopes of doing so. As a developer I find most of my time on Github. By doing so I've developed techniques to improve my productivity on the platform, with GH issues lying at the core of those. That's when I realized I needed a tool like Issueist.
